name: Simulate index matches overlapping legacy and composable templates

headers.warning: 299 Elasticsearch-8.19.3-b341fa884badf4c9209f6155fe0b52150f70f8a8 "index template [v2_template] has index patterns [test*] matching patterns from existing older templates [v1_template] with patterns (v1_template => [test*, t1*]); this template [v2_template] will take precedence during new index creation"
